name: F*CK STALIN
description:
In F*CK STALIN your task is to torture Joseph Stalin and get as many points as possible using a wide variety of blocks and weapons.

GAMEPLAY

In the game you can build your own torture constructions, create an infinite number of Stalins and inflict suffering on him with firearms and white weapons, for which you receive points.

LEADERBOARD

All the points earned in the game are added up and then recorded in the global leaderboard. Perhaps it is YOU who will find yourself at the top of it!

PHOTO MODE

You can stop the game at any time using the advanced photo mode to take the perfect shot and share it with the community.

STEAM WORKSHOP

The game has support for Steam Workshop. Download maps created by the community or add your own creations.
